testcase.name: Register with mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration account page...........................passed When user enters first name "ravikanth" into the first name field..........passed And user enters last name "lella" into the last name field..................passed And user enters email address "ravilella@gmail.com" into email field........passed And user enters password "1234" into password field.........................passed And user enters confirm password "1234" into confirm password field.........passed And user enters telephone number "1234567890" into telephone field..........passed And user selects privacy policy field.......................................passed And user clicks on continue button..........................................passed Then Account should get successfully created................................passed

testcase.name: Register with all fields
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration account page...........................passed When user enters first name "ravikanth" into the first name field..........passed And user enters last name "lella" into the last name field..................passed And user enters email address "ravilella@gmail.com" into email field........passed And user enters password "1234" into password field.........................passed And user enters confirm password "1234" into confirm password field.........passed And user enters telephone number "1234567890" into telephone field..........passed And user selects yes for newsletter.........................................passed And user selects privacy policy field.......................................passed And user clicks on continue button..........................................passed Then Account should get successfully created................................passed

testcase.name: Register without providing fields
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to registration account page...........................passed When user donot enter details into any fields...............................passed And user clicks on continue button..........................................passed Then warning message should be displayed for all the mandatody fields.......passed
